export var groupMessages=function groupMessages(messages){var finalArr=[];var currentArr=[];var currentAuthor='';messages.forEach(function(m){if(m.sender.username!==currentAuthor){if(currentAuthor){finalArr.push([].concat(currentArr));}currentArr.splice(0,currentArr.length);// empty the array
currentArr.push(m);currentAuthor=m.sender.username;}else{currentArr.push(m);}});finalArr.push([].concat(currentArr));return finalArr;};
